text: Hanki mago'a mopama Rubeni naga'mo'zama eri'nazana, ana agupofima me'nea maka rankumatamine, Amori vahe kini ne' Sihoni'ma Hesboni mani'neno kegava hu'nea kumatamine eri'naze. Hagi Sihoni kini ne'ene Midieni kva vahetami Evima, Rekemu'ma, Zuri'ma, Huri'ma Reba'ma ugagota hu'nea ne'ene, Sihoni'ene eri mago hu'naza nagara Mosese'a hara huzamagatere'ne.
